name: Paradice (JUSTCAMH, Igor Konyakhin, saucysaja)
description:
In this cute strategy board game you race against a few enemy pieces, who have a significantly shorter path to victory than you, but you have a key advantage: you choose how to roll the dice!

Start relaxed with a few easy levels, but prepare to think thoroughly at the last one.

Controls Keyboard

Arrow keys or WASD to roll the dice
Hold "Space" to speed up animations
Press "R" to restart the level

Gamepad

D-pad to roll the dice
Hold RT/R2 to speed up animations
Press "Select" (left menu button) to restart the level
Ghosts are not skippable from gamepad though:(

Credits

JustCamh: idea author, developer, 3D artist, shader magician
Igor Konyakhin: developer, level designer, rolling specialist
saucysaja: music composer
